Style/FrozenStringLiteralComment.description:
Description

Add the frozen_string_literal comment to the top of files to help transition to frozen string literals by default.
Style/FrozenStringLiteralComment.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: always (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['always', 'always_true', 'never'] (type: list)
